champion.name: Aatrox
champion.title: the Darkin Blade
champion.quote: Now, hear the silence of annihilation!

champion.name: Akshan
champion.title: the Rogue Sentinel
champion.quote: "Fixing the world, one scoundrel at a time!"

champion.name: Annie
champion.title: the Dark Child
champion.quote: "You wanna play too? It'll be fun!"

champion.name: Aphelios
champion.title: the Weapon of the Faithful
champion.quote: "So many weapons, Aphelios. The deadliest is your faith."

champion.name: Bel'Veth
champion.title: The Empress of the Void
champion.quote: "I am the voice of the silence."

champion.name: Brand
champion.title: the Burning Vengeance
champion.quote: "Ready to set the world on fire? Heheheh..."

champion.name: Camille
champion.title: the Steel Shadow
champion.quote: "Precision is the difference between a butcher and a surgeon."

champion.name: Cho'Gath
champion.title: the Terror of the Void
champion.quote: "You'd wish the world you know to end! Yeeeesssss..."

champion.name: Corki
champion.title: the Daring Bombardier
champion.quote: "I'm up to snuff, and gots me an ace machine!"

champion.name: Ekko
champion.title: the Boy Who Shattered Time
champion.quote: It's not how much time you have, it's how you use it.

champion.name: Elise
champion.title: the Spider Queen
champion.quote: "Only the spider is safe in her web."

champion.name: Gangplank
champion.title: the Saltwater Scourge
champion.quote: "Neither the flames nor the depths could claim me."

champion.name: Garen
champion.title: The Might of Demacia
champion.quote: "My heart and sword always for Demacia."

champion.name: Hecarim
champion.title: the Shadow of War
champion.quote: "Behold, the might of the Shadow Isles."

champion.name: Illaoi
champion.title: the Kraken Priestess
champion.quote: "I'm not big on sermons - broken bones teach better lessons."

champion.name: Jarvan IV
champion.title: the Exemplar of Demacia
champion.quote: "By my will, this shall be finished."

champion.name: Jhin
champion.title: the Virtuoso
champion.quote: "In carnage, I bloom, like a flower in the dawn."

champion.name: Jinx
champion.title: the Loose Cannon
champion.quote: "Rules are made to be broken... like buildings! Or people!"

champion.name: Kai'Sa
champion.title: Daughter of the Void
champion.quote: "Are you the hunter... or the prey?"

champion.name: Karthus
champion.title: the Deathsinger
champion.quote: "Agony, ecstasy, peace. Every passing has a beauty all its own."

champion.name: Kassadin
champion.title: the Void Walker
champion.quote: "The balance of power must be preserved."

champion.name: Kled
champion.title: the Cantankerous Cavalier
champion.quote: "I find courage unpredictable, it's total insanity you can rely on!"

champion.name: LeBlanc
champion.title: the Deceiver
champion.quote: "The Black Rose shall bloom once more."

champion.name: Lissandra
champion.title: the Ice Witch
champion.quote: "I will bury the world in ice."

champion.name: Lucian
champion.title: the Purifier
champion.quote: "Everybody dies. Some just need a little help."

champion.name: Morgana
champion.title: the Fallen
champion.quote: "I am bound, but I will not break."

champion.name: Nami
champion.title: the Tidecaller
champion.quote: "I decide what the tide will bring."

champion.name: Nasus
champion.title: the Curator of the Sands
champion.quote: "The cycle of life and death continues. We will live, they will die."

champion.name: Nunu
champion.title: the Boy and His Yeti
champion.quote: "Every adventure is better with a friend! (Willump noises) (Laughs)"

champion.name: Orianna
champion.title: the Lady of Clockwork
champion.quote: "We will kill your enemies. That will be fun."

champion.name: Poppy
champion.title: Keeper of the Hammer
champion.quote: "I'm no hero—just a Yordle with a hammer."

champion.name: Rell
champion.title: the Iron Maiden
champion.quote: "Nothing gets in, no one gets out."

champion.name: Renata Glasc
champion.title: the Chem-Baroness
champion.quote: "It's 'Miss Glasc'... if you value your life."

champion.name: Senna
champion.title: the Redeemer
champion.quote: "No one fights alone in the Mist."

champion.name: Sivir
champion.title: the Battle Mistress
champion.quote: "I always take my toll - blood, or gold."

champion.name: Swain
champion.title: the Noxian Grand General
champion.quote: "Fear the power you do not see."

champion.name: Tahm Kench
champion.title: The River King
champion.quote: "Call me king, call me demon. Water forgets the names of the drowned."

champion.name: Taric
champion.title: the Shield of Valoran
champion.quote: "That glimmer of hope you see, that's me."

champion.name: Tristana
champion.title: the Yordle Gunner
champion.quote: "Once a Bandle gunner, always a Bandle gunner!"

champion.name: Twitch
champion.title: the Plague Rat
champion.quote: "What doesn't kill you just isn't finished yet."

champion.name: Urgot
champion.title: the Dreadnought
champion.quote: "You cannot know strength... Until you are broken."

champion.name: Vayne
champion.title: the Night Hunter
champion.quote: "Let us hunt those who have fallen to darkness."

champion.name: Veigar
champion.title: the Tiny Master of Evil
champion.quote: "Know that if the tables were turned, I would show you no mercy!"

champion.name: Xayah
champion.title: the Rebel
champion.quote: "I can never resist an invitation to dance."

champion.name: Yasuo
champion.title: the Unforgiven
champion.quote: "Death is like the wind - always by my side."

champion.name: Yorick
champion.title: Shepherd of Souls
champion.quote: "Fear not… I will make use of your corpse."

champion.name: Zeri
champion.title: The Spark of Zaun
champion.quote: A spark is all I need!
